summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of Blewett Street, from Woodlawn Avenue to the right of way of the Northern Pacific Railway, and Bagley Avenue, from the right of way of the Northern Pacific Railway to Kilbourne Street, all in the City of Seattle by grading and curbing the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 367 of the city council of the City of Seattle; and providing payment therefor by the mode of "Payment in Bonds", as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle.
